entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aevo Perpetuals, X2Y2 Fi and v3, DAI Borrowing, and more...
entry.summary: Aevo Perpetuals Ribbonâ€™s options protocol, Aevo, launches perpetual futures. Users are now able to trade both ETH Options and Perpetual contracts with up to 20x leverage. X2Y2 Fi and v3 Live NFT marketplace X2Y2 launches X2Y2 Fi and the v3 upgrade. The X2Y2 Fi is a platform for NFT loans, and v3 improves the platform UX with new features such as Gasless Loan Offer Cancellation, Optimized Gas Expenditure, and Auto Refinance.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maker Spark Lend, Prime Protocol Mainnet, Trade to Earn, and more...
entry.summary: Maker Spark Lend Maker launched Spark Lend, its new lending product that allows users to lend/borrow ETH, stETH, DAI, and sDAI. Spark Lend is not available for users from the U.S. Prime Protocol Mainnet Prime Protocol is now live on Ethereum, Avalanche, Arbitrum One, and Moonbeam. Prime allows users to borrow cross-chain backed by their entire portfolio of cross-chain assets. Prime also launches an Early Adopter Program that rewards users with points.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Vertex Live on Arbitrum, Avalanche Ethereum Native USDC Bridging, Cross-chain Liquid Staking, and more...
entry.summary: Vertex Live on Arbitrum Vertex is now live on Arbitrum, enabling cross-margin trading for spot and derivatives. Vertex combines an off-chain order book layered on top of an on-chain automated market maker on a decentralized, self-custodial exchange.
